00020 #include "BaseArp.h"
00021 #include "FindModule.h"
00022 
00023 Define_Module(BaseArp);
00024 
00025 void BaseArp::initialize(int stage)
00026 {
00027     BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00028     if(stage==0) {
00029         hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00030   }
00031 }
00032 
00033 LAddress::L2Type BaseArp::getMacAddr(const LAddress::L3Type& netwAddr) const
00034 {
00035     Enter_Method("getMacAddr(%d)",netwAddr);
00036     cModule *const netwLayer = simulation.getModule( static_cast<int>(netwAddr) );
00037     if(!netwLayer) {
00038       opp_error("Invalid network address: %d! Could not find a module with "
00039           "that id.", netwAddr);
00040     }
00041     cModule *const pNetwlHost = FindModule<cModule*>::findHost(netwLayer);
00042     if (pNetwlHost) {
00043       const cModule *const pNic = pNetwlHost->getSubmodule( "nic" );
00044     LAddress::L2Type macAddr( pNic ? pNic->getId() : pNetwlHost->getId() );
00045       if (pNic) {
00046       coreEV << "for host[" << pNetwlHost->getIndex()
00047              << "]: netwAddr " << netwAddr << "; MAC address "
00048              << macAddr << std::endl;
00049       }
00050       else {
00051         opp_error("Network address: %d is not from a host module with wireless nic!", netwAddr);
00052       }
00053     return macAddr;
00054     }
00055     opp_error("Network address: %d is not from a host module!", netwAddr);
00056     return LAddress::L2NULL;
00057 }
00058 
00059 LAddress::L3Type BaseArp::myNetwAddr(const cModule* netw) const
00060 {
00061     return LAddress::L3Type( netw->getId() );
00062 }
00063 
00064 LAddress::L2Type BaseArp::myMacAddr(const cModule *mac) const
00065 {
00066     return LAddress::L2Type( mac->getParentModule()->getId() );
00067 }
